TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlSchemaInference extends System.Object

summary.span: 从 XML 文档中推理出 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from an XML document.
The class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 这样会危及你的代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构 （包括内联架构） 的本质上就容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不要在不受信任的情况下接受它们。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 架构验证错误消息和异常可能会公开有关内容模型或架构文件的 URI 路径的敏感信息。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 请注意不要公开此信息来不受信任的调用方。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. 类命名空间，可推断 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构从 XML 文档的结构。The class in the namespace allows you to infer an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the structure of an XML document. 类输出的 XML 架构可以验证 XML 文档。The class outputs an XML schema that can validate the XML document. 类支持 W3C XML 和 XML 架构标准。The class supports the W3C XML and XML Schemas standards. 它可以在推断新架构，或以优化现有架构。It can be used to infer a new schema or to refine an existing schema. ## Examples 此示例使用 XML 文件作为输入，并生成可验证示例 XML 架构。This example takes an XML file as input, and generates a schema that can validate the example XML. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#1)] 下面是输入的 XML 文件。The following is the input XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#5)] 以下是从 XML 文档推断的架构。The following is the schema inferred from the XML document. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 从指定的 XML 文档推理出 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the XML document specified.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet InferSchema(class System.Xml.XmlReader instanceDocument) cil managed
Public Function InferSchema (instanceDocument As XmlReader) As XmlSchemaSet

param.name: instanceDocument
param.span: 对象，该对象包含要从其推理出架构的 XML 文档。

span.span: An object containing the XML document to infer a schema from.

summary.span: 从指定的 对象包含的 XML 文档推理出 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the XML document contained in the object specified.

returns.span: 对象，该对象包含推理出的架构。

span.span: An object containing the inferred schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法推断出一个或多个 W3C XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构从 XML 实例中包含文档指定对象。The method infers one or more W3C XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas from the XML instance document contained in the object specified. 如果 XML 文档包含的元素和属性从多个命名空间，则生成多个架构： 一个用于每个命名空间的文档中使用。If the XML document contains elements and attributes from multiple namespaces, then multiple schemas are generated: one for each namespace used in the document. 主架构架构可以验证整个 XML 文档，且其目标命名空间的 XML 文档的文档元素的命名空间相同。The primary schema is the schema that can validate the entire XML document, and its target namespace is the same as the namespace of the document element of the XML document. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法将忽略任何`xsi:type`， `xsi:schemaLocation`，或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`XML 文档中的属性。The method ignores any `xsi:type`, `xsi:schemaLocation`, or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` attributes in the XML document. - 如果类型化对象，它包含的类型信息被忽略。If the object is typed, the type information it contains is ignored. - 如果对象定位在不是 XML 文档的根元素的元素上，仅为该元素推断的架构。If the object is positioned on an element that is not the root element of the XML document, a schema is inferred for only that element. 如果对象未放置在元素上，方法调用参数直到遇到元素 (例如，当是)。If the object is not positioned on an element, the method is called on the parameter until an element is encountered (for example, when is ). 在此情况中，推断过程将开始从该元素。At this point, the inference process starts from that element. 如果没有元素遇到文档，结束之前一直引发。If no element is encountered until the end of the document, an is thrown. ## Examples 此示例使用 XML 文件作为输入，并生成可验证示例 XML 架构。This example takes an XML file as input, and generates a schema that can validate the example XML. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#1)] 下面是输入的 XML 文件。The following is the input XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#5)] 以下是从 XML 文档推断的架构。The following is the schema inferred from the XML document. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#6)]

exception.span: XML 文档不是格式良好的文档。

span.span: The XML document is not well-formed.

exception.span: 对象不位于根节点或元素上。

span.span: The object is not positioned on the root node or on an element.

exception.span: 架构推理过程中出现错误。

span.span: An error occurs during the schema inference process.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet InferSchema (System.Xml.XmlReader instanceDocument, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet InferSchema(class System.Xml.XmlReader instanceDocument, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas) cil managed
Public Function InferSchema (instanceDocument As XmlReader, schemas As XmlSchemaSet) As XmlSchemaSet
public: System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ InferSchema(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ instanceDocument, System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ schemas);

param.name: instanceDocument
param.span: 对象，该对象包含要从其推理出架构的 XML 文档。

span.span: An object containing the XML document to infer a schema from.

param.name: schemas
param.span: 对象，包含用于精炼推理出的架构的现有架构。

span.span: An object containing an existing schema used to refine the inferred schema.

summary.span: 从指定的 对象包含的 XML 文档推理出 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构，并通过用相同目标命名空间指定的 对象中的现有架构精炼已推理出的架构。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the XML document contained in the object specified, and refines the inferred schema using an existing schema in the object specified with the same target namespace.

returns.span: 对象，该对象包含推理出的架构。

span.span: An object containing the inferred schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法推断出一个或多个 W3C XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构从 XML 实例中包含文档指定对象。The method infers one or more W3C XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas from the XML instance document contained in the object specified. 如果 XML 文档包含来自多个命名空间元素和属性，则会生成多个架构： 一个用于每个命名空间的文档中使用。If the XML document contains elements and attributes from multiple namespaces, multiple schemas are generated: one for each namespace used in the document. 主架构架构可以验证整个 XML 文档，且其目标命名空间的 XML 文档的文档元素的命名空间相同。The primary schema is the schema that can validate the entire XML document, and its target namespace is the same as the namespace of the document element of the XML document. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法将忽略任何`xsi:type`， `xsi:schemaLocation`，或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`XML 文档中的属性。The method ignores any `xsi:type`, `xsi:schemaLocation`, or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` attributes in the XML document. - 如果类型化对象，它包含的类型信息被忽略。If the object is typed, the type information it contains is ignored. - 如果对象定位在不是 XML 文档的根元素的元素上，仅为该元素推断的架构。If the object is positioned on an element that is not the root element of the XML document, a schema is inferred for only that element. 如果对象未放置在元素上，方法调用参数直到遇到元素 (例如，当是)。If the object is not positioned on an element, the method is called on the parameter until an element is encountered (for example, when is ). 在此情况中，推断过程将开始从该元素。At this point, the inference process starts from that element. 如果没有元素遇到文档，结束之前一直引发。If no element is encountered until the end of the document, an is thrown. - 如果对象作为参数，并对其元素传递定位对象在一个中的架构中定义，推断出的架构用于优化中的现有架构参数具有相同的目标命名空间;否则，新的架构会被推断为命名空间。If an object is passed as a parameter and the element upon which the object is positioned is defined in one of the schemas in the , the inferred schema is used to refine an existing schema in the parameter with the same target namespace; otherwise, a new schema is inferred for the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 XML 文档作为输入 1，并生成架构可以验证 XML 文档 1。The following example code takes XML document 1 as an input and generates a schema that can validate XML document 1. 然后，示例代码获取 XML 文档 2，并改进从 XML 文档 1，根据在 XML 文档 2 中找到的更改生成的架构。The example code then takes XML document 2 and refines the schema generated from XML document 1, based on the changes found in XML document 2. 以下是 XML 文档 1。The following is XML document 1. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/item1.xml#13)] 以下是 XML 文档 2。The following is XML document 2. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/item2.xml#14)] 下面的代码示例从推理架构中包含的第一个 XML 文档`reader`，然后重新推断出的架构定义了在中包含的第二个 XML 文档中找到的更改和`reader1`。The following example code infers a schema from the first XML document contained in `reader`, and then refines the inferred schema with the changes found in the second XML document contained in `reader1`. 该示例代码使用第一个重载方法推断的架构和第二个重载方法，以优化中的现有架构对象。The example code uses the first overloaded method to infer the schema, and the second overloaded method to refine the existing schema in the object. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#4)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#4)] 下面的架构是从 XML 文档 1 推断的架构。The following schema is the schema inferred from XML document 1. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#15](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/InferSchema1.xml#15)] 下面的架构是架构的上面的完善的版本基于 XML 文档 2。The following schema is the refined version of the schema above, based on XML document 2. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/InferSchema2.xml#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption Occurrence { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值影响从 XML 文档推理出的架构匹配项声明。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that affects schema occurrence declarations inferred from the XML document.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为、 XML 文档中遇到的第一个时间元素、 架构声明将被推断为`minOccurs="1"`。If the property is set to , the first time elements are encountered in the XML document, the schema declaration is inferred as `minOccurs="1"`. 当遇到特性时，架构声明将被推断为`use="required"`。When attributes are encountered, the schema declaration is inferred as `use="required"`. 如果属性设置为，元素架构声明均推断为`minOccurs="0"`，和属性架构声明会被推断为`use="optional"`。If the property is set to , element schema declarations are inferred as `minOccurs="0"`, and attribute schema declarations are inferred as `use="optional"`. 默认值属性是。The default value of the property is . ## Examples 此示例演示了如何受匹配项属性。This example illustrates how occurrence is affected by the property. 此代码示例通过两种方式推断从 XML 文件的匹配项： 宽松和受限制。The example code infers occurrence from an XML file in two different ways: relaxed and restricted. 以下是示例 XML 文件。The following is the example XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/Occurrence1.xml#7)] 下面的代码示例指示类宽松方式推断元素和属性的匹配项。The following example code instructs the class to infer occurrence of elements and attributes in a relaxed way. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#2)] 因为属性设置为，生成下面的架构。Because the property was set to , the following schema was generated. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/Occurrence2.xml#8)] 在示例代码中，如果属性未设置为、类具有默认设置为和生成下面的架构。In the example code above, if the property was not set to , the class would have defaulted to and generated the following schema. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/Occurrence3.xml#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption TypeInference { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置影响从 XML 文档推理出的类型的 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that affects types inferred from the XML document.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为，具有简单内容的 XML 文档中的元素和属性的推断的类型始终是`xs:string`。If the property is set to , the inferred type of elements and attributes in the XML document with simple content is always `xs:string`. 如果属性设置为，推断更具体的类型，如`xs:date`， `xs:decimal`， `xs:unsignedByte`，依次类推。If the property is set to , more specific types are inferred, such as `xs:date`, `xs:decimal`, `xs:unsignedByte`, and so on. 默认值属性是。The default value of the property is . ## Examples 此示例演示了如何受类型推理属性。This example illustrates how type inference is affected by the property. 此代码示例通过两种方式推断类型从 XML 文件： 宽松和受限制。The example code infers types from an XML file in two different ways: relaxed and restricted. 以下是示例 XML 文件。The following is the example XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#10](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/TypeInference1.xml#10)] 下面的代码示例指示类推断`xs:string`元素和属性具有简单内容。The following example code instructs the class to infer `xs:string` for elements and attributes with simple content. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#3)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#3)] 因为属性设置为，生成下面的架构。Because the property was set to , the following schema was generated. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#11](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/TypeInference2.xml#11)] 在示例代码中，如果属性未设置为、类具有默认设置为和生成下面的架构。In the example code above, if the property was not set to , the class would have defaulted to and generated the following schema. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#12](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/TypeInference3.xml#12)]
